roleset.name: starting with a kick

example.name: arg1, single word
example.text: The official time for the kickoff of Super Bowl 47 is 6:30 p.m. Eastern Time on Sunday, Feb. 3, 2013, the NFL has announced.

example.name: both args, single word
example.text: Nonnie G and celebrity friends began their kickoff of his tour

example.name: both args, hyphenated
example.text: The Salvation Army of Mahaska County is pleased to announce their kick-off of the Red Kettle campaign bell-ringing season ...
example.arg: of the Red Kettle campaign bell-ringing season

example.name: both args, separate words
example.text: Let's wish the boys all the best in their kick off of Beautiful Show in Seoul on 4th Feb

roleset.note: KICKOFF-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from kickoff.01-n)
